scripts.all: node-sass src/all.sass dist/all.css && node-sass src/all.sass dist/all.min.css --output-style=compressed
scripts.demo: node-sass src/_demo.sass dist/demo.css && node-sass src/_demo.sass dist/demo.min.css --output-style=compressed
scripts.grid: node-sass src/_grid.sass dist/grid.css && node-sass src/_grid.sass dist/grid.min.css --output-style=compressed
scripts.button: node-sass src/_button.sass dist/button.css && node-sass src/_button.sass dist/button.min.css --output-style=compressed
scripts.form: node-sass src/_form.sass dist/form.css && node-sass src/_form.sass dist/form.min.css --output-style=compressed
